name: AVCaptureAudioDataOutput
desc: A capture output that records audio and provides access to audio sample buffers as they are recorded.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates an instance of audio data output.

items.name: var audioSettings: [String : Any]!
items.desc: The settings used to decode or re-encode audio before it’s output.

items.name: func recommendedAudioSettingsForAssetWriter(writingTo: AVFileType) -> [String : Any]?
items.desc: Specifies the recommended settings for use with an AVAssetWriterInput.

items.name: func setSampleBufferDelegate(AVCaptureAudioDataOutputSampleBufferDelegate?, queue: DispatchQueue?)
items.desc: Sets the delegate that will accept captured buffers and the dispatch queue on which the delegate will be called.

items.name: var sampleBufferCallbackQueue: DispatchQueue?
items.desc: The queue on which delegate callbacks are invoked

items.name: protocol AVCaptureAudioDataOutputSampleBufferDelegate
items.desc: Methods for receiving audio sample data from an audio capture.
